title: Aikatsu Stars! - Ecstasy (Doujinshi)
description: Koukotsu, or Ecstasy, is a story of Mrs. Kasumi confronting her daughter Yozora for committing an immoral act. Yozora tries to reason with her mother, but she ends up digging her own grave. What will Yozora do now that her mother has found out about her incestuous relationship with her younger sister Mahiru?
